docs.snippet: THOSE apparently insignificant events which really make history are seldom featured in the press; the merely spectacular too frequently crowds the essential out of the public sheets. Let a riot disturb the streets of Buenos Ayres and the type will...
docs.lead_paragraph: THOSE apparently insignificant events which really make history are seldom featured in the press; the merely spectacular too frequently crowds the essential out of the public sheets. Let a riot disturb the streets of Buenos Ayres and the type will proclaim the fact.

headline.main: EUROPE FLIRTS WITH ARGENTINA TO WIN HER RICH TRADE; The Recently Elected President Is Very Favorable to Trans- atlantic Countries -- American Shipping May Suffer.

docs.snippet: American rabbis have appointed a committee to do what it can to induce those who decide what shall be presented on the stage of this country to cut out what the rabbis term objectionable lampooning of the Jew. The movement is somewhat like that...
docs.lead_paragraph: American rabbis have appointed a committee to do what it can to induce those who decide what shall be presented on the stage of this country to cut out what the rabbis term objectionable lampooning of the Jew. The movement is somewhat like that started by several Irish organizations some years ago against the stage portrayal of the Irishman as a person with red hair, green whiskers, and costume to suit.
docs.abstract: Central Conf of Amer Rabbis appts com to write to theatre mgrs about objectionable caricature of the Jew

headline.main: AS TO STAGE LAMPOONS.; American Rabbis Now Stirred by Caricatures of the Jew.

headline.main: A REVOLT IN URUGUAY?; Said to Have Started In Connection with Presidential Election.

docs.snippet: MONTEVIDEO, Uruguay, Oct. 29. -- President Williman to-day appointed Senor Vidal, the present Minister of Finance, Minister of Foreign Affairs pro tem., in succession to Dr. Bachini, who retired from the Foreign Office yesterday at the request of the...
docs.lead_paragraph: MONTEVIDEO, Uruguay, Oct. 29. -- President Williman to-day appointed Senor Vidal, the present Minister of Finance, Minister of Foreign Affairs pro tem., in succession to Dr. Bachini, who retired from the Foreign Office yesterday at the request of the President.
docs.abstract: 3,000 insurgents on way to join rebels; Foreign Min A Bachini resigns at Pres C Williman request

headline.main: URUGUAY REBELS GATHERING IN FORCE; 3,000 Insurgents Advancing from Brazilian Frontier to Join Scattered Allies.

docs.snippet: MONTEVIDEO, Uruguay, Oct. 30 (Via Buenos Ayres.) -- The revolutionary movement is taking on a serious aspect. There are now 10,000 armed revolutionists who are gradually being concentrated. Several skirmishes have taken place, but facts as to the...
docs.lead_paragraph: MONTEVIDEO, Uruguay, Oct. 30 (Via Buenos Ayres.) -- The revolutionary movement is taking on a serious aspect. There are now 10,000 armed revolutionists who are gradually being concentrated. Several skirmishes have taken place, but facts as to the casualties have been concealed.

headline.main: URUGUAY REVOLT GROWS.; 10,000 Armed Revolutionists Gathering -- Government Losses Concealed.
URUGUAY REBELS SURRENDER; Give Up Their Arms and Trust to Government's Magnanimity.
